## Description
The Delivery Drone is an unmanned aerial vehicle used for dropping off light cargo at nearby depots and settlements.

|Type:|DELIVERY_DRONE|
|Model:|A|

|Length:|1.75|
|Base Range:|915.18 km|
|Fuel Efficiency:|0.95|
|Attachment Slots:|0|
